articles.title: Taiwanese singer Yu Tian on daughter's battle with cancer: 'She begged me to let her go' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: His 38-year-old daughter, who is also a singer, has been battling colorectal cancer for the past eight years. The mother of two suffered three relapses and has undergone almost 70 rounds of chemotherapy treatment.
articles.content: Taiwanese crooner Yu Tians 38-year-old daughter Yuan-chis health has further deteriorated. The singer and mother of two has been battling colorectal cancer for the past eight years. According to Chin… [+1466 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Fong
articles.title: Rising prices, harder lives: Soaring inflation leaves people poorer across Asia - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Asian Insider looks at the reasons for the surge in prices and how people are coping.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
For the young Wijaya family of four, home-cooked meals have become a little blander in the past months as soaring food prices have hit them hard.
Scrimping to save money, Ms Trie Gusnia Lanasha, 25,… [+460 chars]
